tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE content_approval_workflow (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id INT,
    approver_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE content_approval (
    content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    approval_status BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    workflow_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (workflow_id) REFERENCES approval_workflows(workflow_id)
);

CREATE TABLE approval_history (
    approval_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id INT NOT NULL,
    approval_date DATE NOT NULL,
    approver_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (content_id) REFERENCES content_approval(content_id)
);

CREATE TABLE content_approval_workflow (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id UUID,
    approval_status VARCHAR(50),
    approval_date TIMESTAMP,
    approver_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE approval_history (
    approval_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    request_id INT NOT NULL,
    approver_id INT NOT NULL,
    approved_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (request_id) REFERENCES approval_requests(request_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (approver_id) REFERENCES approvers(approver_id)
);

CREATE TABLE pending_approval (
    request_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assigned_approver INT NOT NULL,
    deadline TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (request_id) REFERENCES approval_requests(request_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (assigned_approver) REFERENCES approvers(approver_id)
);

CREATE TABLE approval_comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    request_id INT NOT NULL,
    comment TEXT NOT NULL,
    commented_by INT NOT NULL,
    comment_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (request_id) REFERENCES approval_requests(request_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (commented_by) REFERENCES approvers(approver_id)
);
